task.summary: Initial commit. Includes master lists of virtue and flaw objects.

Initial commit of Angular UI. UI for Character description, characteristics, abilities, and arts. Created list of books for front end and backend. Constified book names in virtues/flaws list. Added abilities list, csv data, code generator. Added CSS file.

Added character list and edit views. Switched to using Mongo for primary database--this is much easier. Switched to using ui.router instead of ngRoute. Added drag-droppable, paginated virtues. Added experience points table.
Move virtues and flaws lists to javascript files. Fixed virtues/flaws drag and drop
Multicolumn layout for virtues and flaws to make better use of space.

Adjusted character list layout. Submitting now saves and redirects to edit page, not to list, to allow players to continue editing. Added spell calculator. Broke character page tabs into lazily loaded templates. Adjusted state hierarchy so that CharacterBaseController is above other Character Controllers.

Abstracted Mongo server information to settings.py. Removed django-extensions dependency. Added dice roller functions. Initial commit of character view, which is intended for in-game use rather than character creation.
Added MongoHQ connection, Procfile, gunicorn stuff for Heroku. Added puissant/affinity checkboxes onto arts/abilities as a stopgap. Added separate local settings file for running locally.
Add gitignore, requirements.txt, fix static files, remove sqlite from heroku version.

Add gitignore, requirements.txt, fix static files, remove sqlite from heroku version.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Add gitignore, requirements.txt, fix static files, remove sqlite from heroku version.
